>
[Maestro's Instrument](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3026)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 275 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _maestro's instrument_ can be crafted in the form of any variety of handheld musical instruments. A _maestro's instrument_ grants you a +1 item bonus to Performance checks while playing music with the instrument. 

**Activate—Charming Performance** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You play the instrument, causing it to cast a DC 17 [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) spell.
